hero.label: THE PROTOCOL
hero.title: How It Works
hero.subtitle: FlorenceEGI is not just art. It is an open protocol that different projects "manipulate" to create value in completely different sectors.

protocol.title: EGI is a protocol, not a product
protocol.body1: An EGI is like an empty structure certified on the Algorand blockchain: a neutral container of authenticity, provenance and value. Each project fills it with its own logic.
protocol.body2: The same protocol that certifies a work of art can authenticate a municipal resolution, or be used as a pure trading asset. The protocol is one ‚Äî the uses are infinite.

manipulators.title: EGI Manipulators
manipulators.subtitle: Each project uses the EGI protocol in its own way. Same standard, radically different purposes.

art.title: Florence ART
art.desc: Transforms artworks, products and physical goods into digital assets tradable on primary and secondary markets. The EGI becomes the certified "digital twin" of the object, with automatic royalties to the creator on every resale.
art.f1: Immutable CoA (Certificate of Authenticity) on Algorand blockchain
art.f2: Automatic royalties to creator: fixed 4.5% on every resale
art.f3: Built-in EPP: automatic environmental quota on every transaction
art.f4: Customisable utility traits: access, rewards, exclusive benefits
art.f5: Permanent Co-Creator: the patron's signature stays on the blockchain forever
art.earn: Creator (4.5% royalty on every resale) + platform + EPP. The secondary market generates perpetual income for the creator.

natan.title: NATAN LOC
natan.desc: Uses EGIs to notarise documents from Public Administrations. A resolution, minutes, an act ‚Äî once "EGI-ified" it becomes incorruptible: its hash is on the blockchain, its authenticity is verifiable by anyone, forever.
natan.f1: Cryptographic hash of the document on Algorand: impossible to alter without detection
natan.f2: Immediate public verification: anyone can check the authenticity of the act
natan.f3: Anti-hallucination AI RAG (FARO): intelligent searches on municipal documents
natan.f4: Multi-tenant: each Municipality has its own isolated and secure space
natan.earn: The entity (Municipality/PA) pays a SaaS subscription. No trading on documents: no royalties, no transaction fees.

pt.title: Florence PT
pt.desc: "Satellite" EGIs linked to ART physical EGIs, designed exclusively for dynamic trading. Zero fees: neither the platform nor the creator earns from PT. Only the trader earns. The function is to generate volume and visibility for the entire ecosystem.
pt.f1: Zero fees (0%): no platform cost, no royalties to the creator
pt.f3: High-frequency trading to generate liquidity and volume
pt.f4: Marketing function: generates popularity and hype for linked ART collections
pt.earn: Only the trader. Neither the platform nor creators earn from PT. It is a visibility vehicle for the ecosystem, not a profit tool.
